root.name: Color a Dinosaur
root.description: Color A Dinosaur is a digital coloring book for the NES. First you choose one of sixteen different coloring pages, then you can color it by choosing from a number of different colors and patterns. Color A Dinosaur features four different palette to choose from, each with ten different colors, including the anatomically accurate flashing purple and cyan checkerboard color. Due to the NES's rather slow CPU speed, color fills are often very slow.

similar_games.game: Electric Crayon Deluxe: Dinosaurs Are Forever
